outputs.output_descr: This project focuses on allowing wage-earners within the vulnerable families' access to skill rehabilitation and vocational training opportunities, improve their access to employment and capacity for self-employment, and helping improve income resilience as a result of direct in-kind support as well as linkages with host community and society.

project_descr: Emergency Assistance project for livelihoods restoration of Abyan Internal displaced persons.
project_title: Emergency Assistance project for livelihoods restoration
